top_comments.comment: Wrong video I know, but your "how to change a toilet fill valve and flush valve" video was a great help, so thank you 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻💪🏻

comments_since_last_sample.body: Powerful job. Your attention to detail means the end result is top class.

Cast iron refund?! 
Your perceived expertise at a wide range of jobs might be enhanced by taking account of YouTube's habit of hiding the bottom right portion of literally every single thumbnail.
